comment: Express membership in a half-open integer interval in terms of the "less than or equal to" and "less than" predicates on integers, resp. ` K e. ( ZZ>= `` M ) <-> M <_ K ` , ` K e. ( K ..^ N ) <-> K < N ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Sep-2015.)
